biotools.summary: Prepares pedigree data for calculation of Elston-Stewarts’ likelihood function. It finds an optimal way to peel a pedigree and returns text file containing 7 description arrays.

bioschemas.name: PedPeel
bioschemas.summary: Prepares pedigree data for calculation of Elston-Stewarts’ likelihood function. It finds an optimal way to peel a pedigree and returns text file containing 7 description arrays.
